page.title: 12JUNIOR CLUBS IN NORTHWOLD
page.content: The Playgroup/Mums and Toddlers meet every Wednesday in the village hall.It is for children under the school age of 5 years to encourage them to mix with other children. The St John's Ambulance Cadets meet every Wednesday in the village school.Children can join at the age of 6 years.Membership is free.The cadets have an annual church parade and they attend various fetes and functions in a first aid capacity. The Judo club meets every Friday in the village hall.Membership is 40p a session. The Sunday School meets every Sunday in the village school.It is affiliated to the church and one Sunday a month the children attend the church service. Brownies,Guides,Cubs and Scouts meet weekly in neighbouring villages.
